title: Follow to partecipate into a skin giveaway the stream of this diamond guy!
body:
STREAM IS UP. FOLLOW NOW TO HAVE THE CHANCE TO PARTECIPATE TO THE RAFFLE! Diamond 3 player is going to make a nice skin giveaway for all his followers~!
14 october at this channel: https://go.twitch.tv/onlylux92man
we'll make a random raffle between all the followers who followed the channel to give them the skin they'd like (975rp skin, Could be higher depends on partecipation!)
All you need to do is to follow the channe to enter the raffle!
RAFFLE WILL BE DONE THE 14 OCTOBER AND WILL BE STREAMED!

replies.body: Raffle significa anche spazzatura, oltre che lotteria: nomen omen?
